<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>clone_data_exclude</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Clone Exclude Table Validate Name</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[validateRegEx(current.name);
function validateRegEx(pattern) { if (pattern == '.*') { gs.addErrorMessage('Name cannot be ".*" - this would exclude all tables from clone'); current.setAbortAction(true); return; }
try { Packages.java.util.regex.Pattern.compile(pattern); } catch (e) { gs.addErrorMessage('Name is not a valid regular expression'); current.setAbortAction(true); return; } }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2012-05-04 23:19:21</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>0d3dc721373120004f6a80f7bcbe5dcb</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Clone Exclude Table Validate Name</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="High Availability Cloning" source="com.snc.ha">ba533ca03c31311068bcf327dfe37f7a</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_0d3dc721373120004f6a80f7bcbe5dcb</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2012-05-05 21:59:38</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0d3dc721373120004f6a80f7bcbe5dcb"/> </record_update>
